name: Coding is a rollercoaster!
description: I love coding, especially when I get my coding to work, but when you have to sit there and debug it. UGH! that is is the most frustrating!

name: This is literally the best
description: I REALLY like coding! This is definitley the right career choice for me

name: The Struggle
description: Not going to lie, I really struggled on the OOP topic. It's taking a while for me to really grasp and understand all the concepts!

name: Any Advice?
description: I feel like I am getting the main concept of all the topics that I have been learning, but I am curious, does anyone have any advice that could help reallly master all these coding concepts?
